questions.q1: What VoIP services does Bitcall offer?
questions.q2: How does your reseller panel work?
questions.q3: Can I get data-only eSIM plans?
questions.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.q6: How white-labeled is the panel really?
questions.q7: Can I upgrade my plan or add features later?
questions.q8: Does Bitcall provide a Sippy Softswitch server?
questions.q9: Is there an API or bot integration available?
questions.q10: How fast can I go live and start selling?
questions.q11: How are payments handled for my clients?
questions.q12: What kind of support do I get with each plan?

answers.a1: We cover A-Z termination, outbound call center routes, CLI/NCLI routes, and inbound virtual numbers.
answers.a2: Our reseller panel is a turnkey solution. You buy at wholesale rates and sell at your own price‚Äîno infrastructure investment needed.
answers.a3: Yes! Our eSIM plans are available in daily, weekly, or monthly packages with broad global coverage.
answers.a4: We accept ALL payment methods. Visa and Mastercard, and we also accept BTC, USDT, ETH, SOL, and BNB. It‚Äôs never been easier or more flexible to start calling worldwide.
answers.a5: Simply sign up, add your IPs, and make a test payment starting from just $1 to start exploring our services.
answers.a6: Completely. Even on Essential, your clients see your domain, logo, and colors. Professional & Elite unlock full white-label control: branded invoices, emails, templates, and login experience.
answers.a7: Yes. You can upgrade plans at any time or purchase add-ons like more vendors, routing groups, or support options. It‚Äôs fully modular.
answers.a8: Yes ‚Äî with the Elite plan. You get your own hosted Sippy Softswitch server integrated with Bitcall‚Äôs management panel, letting you operate like a true telecom provider.
answers.a9: The Elite plan includes full API access to automate accounts, billing, notifications, and more. Telegram bot alerts are also included, and WhatsApp alerts are available in the Professional plan.
answers.a10: Setup is nearly instant. You can go live in under 15 minutes with one-click provisioning for numbers, trunks, and accounts ‚Äî no hardware required.
answers.a11: Your clients can pay via Stripe, PayPal, Crypto, and more. The panel supports multi-currency pricing and usage-based billing (per minute or per plan).
answers.a12: Essential includes email support. Professional adds WhatsApp support and priority response. Elite includes dedicated VIP support via phone or private channels.
